trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.ItemDataBind"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.ItemDataBind"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: A list control contains a collection of items.
trans-unit.target: Um controle de lista contém uma coleção de itens.

trans-unit.source: These items are of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> class.
When providing default rendering, the list control represents a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> by its <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ao fornecer processamento padrão, o controle de lista representa um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>por seu <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: In templated rendering, the template can render any desired property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> or associated data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: Na renderização de modelo, o modelo pode processar qualquer propriedade desejada de um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>ou objeto de associação de dados associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: If an item is data-bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se um item de dados associados a um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>objeto, o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind>é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: At this time, the handler can set properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object from arbitrary expressions.
trans-unit.target: Neste momento, o manipulador pode definir propriedades do <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>objeto a partir de expressões arbitrárias.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventHandler> delegate for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> control, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventHandler>delegar uma <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>controle, que você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> control notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>controle notifica o manipulador quando um item de evento é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A menos que você remova o representante, o manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre.
